languages.text: {n}Комиссар разводит руками.{/n} "Стараюсь быть полезным. Ведьминскому культу Губительной жажды нравится этот маленький спектакль — просто убийства их мало забавляют, им хочется чего-то более... пикантного. Люди думают, что находятся в шаге от спасения, а затем понимают, куда попали. Эта смесь отчаяния, боли предательства, ужаса и разбитых надежд — словно специя на предсмертные мучения".

traits.locale_text: {n}Комиссар разводит руками.{/n} "Стараюсь быть полезным. Ведьминскому культу Губительной жажды нравится этот маленький спектакль — просто убийства их мало забавляют, им хочется чего-то более... пикантного. Люди думают, что находятся в шаге от спасения, а затем понимают, куда попали. Эта смесь отчаяния, боли предательства, ужаса и разбитых надежд — словно специя на предсмертные мучения".
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}The Commissar shrugs.{/n} "Just trying to be useful. The Wych Cult of the Fatal Thirst enjoys this little show I've put on. Killings don't amuse them all that much, they want something more... flavourful. Those people think they're just a step away from salvation, and then they realise where they are. The combination of despair, pain of betrayal, horror, and broken hopes — it adds spice to their death agonies."
languages.original_text: {n}Комиссар разводит руками.{/n} "Стараюсь быть полезным. languages.text: {n}政委耸了耸肩。{/n}“我只想当个有用的人而已，巫灵教派很喜欢我上演的这个小节目。对他们而言，单纯的杀戮并没有什么乐趣。他们想看到的是……更有风味的表演。那些人以为他们离救赎只有一步之遥，随后他们才会意识到真正的处境。绝望、恐怖、背叛的痛苦、破碎的希望……这一切结合在一起，会让他们痛苦的死亡更加美味。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar shrugs.{/n} "Just trying to be useful. The Wych Cult of the Fatal Thirst enjoys this little show I've put on. Killings don't amuse them all that much, they want something more... flavourful. Those people think they're just a step away from salvation, and then they realise where they are. The combination of despair, pain of betrayal, horror, and broken hopes — it adds spice to their death agonies."

traits.locale_text: {n}政委耸了耸肩。{/n}“我只想当个有用的人而已，巫灵教派很喜欢我上演的这个小节目。对他们而言，单纯的杀戮并没有什么乐趣。他们想看到的是……更有风味的表演。那些人以为他们离救赎只有一步之遥，随后他们才会意识到真正的处境。绝望、恐怖、背叛的痛苦、破碎的希望……这一切结合在一起，会让他们痛苦的死亡更加美味。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}コミッサーが肩をすくめる。{/n}「自分にできることをやっているまでです。すべては「宿命の渇き」教団に満足していただくため――彼女たちは私が主催するショーを大層気に入っている。ただ殺すだけではつまらない…もっと見ごたえのあるものを求めているのです。あと少しで救われると望みを持った者たちが奈落の底に突き落とされたときに見せる絶望、裏切りによる苦しみ、恐怖、そして失われた希望が…彼らの死に際のスパイスとしてより一層際立たせてくれるのです」
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar shrugs.{/n} "Just trying to be useful. The Wych Cult of the Fatal Thirst enjoys this little show I've put on. Killings don't amuse them all that much, they want something more... flavourful. Those people think they're just a step away from salvation, and then they realise where they are. The combination of despair, pain of betrayal, horror, and broken hopes — it adds spice to their death agonies."

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーが肩をすくめる。{/n}「自分にできることをやっているまでです。すべては「宿命の渇き」教団に満足していただくため――彼女たちは私が主催するショーを大層気に入っている。ただ殺すだけではつまらない…もっと見ごたえのあるものを求めているのです。あと少しで救われると望みを持った者たちが奈落の底に突き落とされたときに見せる絶望、裏切りによる苦しみ、恐怖、そして失われた希望が…彼らの死に際のスパイスとしてより一層際立たせてくれるのです」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}El Comisario se encoge de hombros.{/n} «Solo intentaba ser útil. El Culto de Brujas de la Sed Letal disfruta con este espectáculo que he montado. Solo matar no las divierte mucho, prefieren algo con más... emoción. Esta gente se cree que está a un paso de la salvación, y luego comprende dónde está. La combinación de la desesperación, el dolor de la traición, el pánico y las esperanzas extinguidas da un toque muy especial a su muerte agónica».
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar shrugs.{/n} "Just trying to be useful. The Wych Cult of the Fatal Thirst enjoys this little show I've put on. Killings don't amuse them all that much, they want something more... flavourful. Those people think they're just a step away from salvation, and then they realise where they are. The combination of despair, pain of betrayal, horror, and broken hopes — it adds spice to their death agonies."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Comisario se encoge de hombros.{/n} «Solo intentaba ser útil. El Culto de Brujas de la Sed Letal disfruta con este espectáculo que he montado. Solo matar no las divierte mucho, prefieren algo con más... emoción. Esta gente se cree que está a un paso de la salvación, y luego comprende dónde está. La combinación de la desesperación, el dolor de la traición, el pánico y las esperanzas extinguidas da un toque muy especial a su muerte agónica».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar shrugs.{/n} "Just trying to be useful. The Wych Cult of the Fatal Thirst enjoys this little show I've put on. Killings don't amuse them all that much, they want something more... flavourful. Those people think they're just a step away from salvation, and then they realise where they are. The combination of despair, pain of betrayal, horror, and broken hopes — it adds spice to their death agonies."

languages.text: {n}Il hausse les épaules.{/n} « J'essaie simplement de me rendre utile. Le Culte Céraste de la Soif Fatale est particulièrement friand de mon petit spectacle. Les massacres purs et simples ne leur font ni chaud ni froid, ils cherchent un peu plus de... saveurs. Imaginez un peu : les gens que j'envoie dans l'arène se croient à deux doigts de la liberté, et puis ils comprennent où ils sont. Cette combinaison de désillusion, de sentiment de trahison, d'horreur et d'espoirs brisés, c'est un peu comme la cerise sur le gâteau de leur agonie, vous voyez ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar shrugs.{/n} "Just trying to be useful. The Wych Cult of the Fatal Thirst enjoys this little show I've put on. Killings don't amuse them all that much, they want something more... flavourful. Those people think they're just a step away from salvation, and then they realise where they are. The combination of despair, pain of betrayal, horror, and broken hopes — it adds spice to their death agonies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il hausse les épaules.{/n} « J'essaie simplement de me rendre utile. Le Culte Céraste de la Soif Fatale est particulièrement friand de mon petit spectacle. Les massacres purs et simples ne leur font ni chaud ni froid, ils cherchent un peu plus de... saveurs. Imaginez un peu : les gens que j'envoie dans l'arène se croient à deux doigts de la liberté, et puis ils comprennent où ils sont. Cette combinaison de désillusion, de sentiment de trahison, d'horreur et d'espoirs brisés, c'est un peu comme la cerise sur le gâteau de leur agonie, vous voyez ? »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Der Kommissar zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Ich versuche lediglich, nützlich zu sein. Der Hekatarii-Kult des Fatalen Dursts hat Freude an meiner kleinen Show.. Das Töten allein amüsiert sie nur bedingt, sie wollen etwas ... Spannenderes. Diese Leute glauben, sie seien nur einen Schritt von der Erlösung entfernt, und dann erkennen sie, wo sie sich befinden. Die Kombination aus Verzweiflung, dem Schmerz des Verrats, dem Schrecken und der zerstörten Hoffnung – das verleiht ihrer Todesqual Würze."
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar shrugs.{/n} "Just trying to be useful. The Wych Cult of the Fatal Thirst enjoys this little show I've put on. Killings don't amuse them all that much, they want something more... flavourful. Those people think they're just a step away from salvation, and then they realise where they are. The combination of despair, pain of betrayal, horror, and broken hopes — it adds spice to their death agonies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kommissar zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Ich versuche lediglich, nützlich zu sein. Der Hekatarii-Kult des Fatalen Dursts hat Freude an meiner kleinen Show.. Das Töten allein amüsiert sie nur bedingt, sie wollen etwas ... Spannenderes. Diese Leute glauben, sie seien nur einen Schritt von der Erlösung entfernt, und dann erkennen sie, wo sie sich befinden. Die Kombination aus Verzweiflung, dem Schmerz des Verrats, dem Schrecken und der zerstörten Hoffnung – das verleiht ihrer Todesqual Würze."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Komiser omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Bir işe yaramaya çalışıyorum yalnızca. Ölüme Susamışlığın Tarikatı Viçleri, bu küçük gösterimi seviyor. Katliam onları o kadar da eğlendirmiyor. Daha... Çeşnili bir şeyler istiyorlar. Bu insanlar kurtuluşa erişmelerine sadece bir adım kaldığını sanıyor, sonra nerede olduklarını fark ediyorlar. Keder, ihanetin acısı, dehşet ve içlerindeki umudun yok oluşu, ölümlerinin ızdırabına baharat katıyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar shrugs.{/n} "Just trying to be useful. The Wych Cult of the Fatal Thirst enjoys this little show I've put on. Killings don't amuse them all that much, they want something more... flavourful. Those people think they're just a step away from salvation, and then they realise where they are. The combination of despair, pain of betrayal, horror, and broken hopes — it adds spice to their death agonies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Komiser omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Bir işe yaramaya çalışıyorum yalnızca. Ölüme Susamışlığın Tarikatı Viçleri bu küçük gösterimi seviyor. Katliam onları o kadar da çok eğlendirmiyor. Daha... Çeşnili bir şeyler istiyorlar. Bu insanlar kurtuluşa erişmelerine sadece bir adım kaldığını sanıyor, ardından da nerede olduklarını fark ediyorlar. Keder, ihanetin acısı, dehşet ve içlerindeki umudun yok oluşu, ölümlerinin ızdırabına baharat katıyor."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
